title: People Watching: Human Actions as a Cue for Single View Geometry

author: David Fouhey, Robotics Institute, School of Computer Science, Carnegie Mellon University
chairman: Aude Oliva, Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence Laboratory (CSAIL), Massachusetts Institute of Technology, MIT
Silvio Savarese, Department of Electrical Engineering and Computer Science, University of Michigan
